From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein's attorney? 
Date: Wed, 10 Jul 2019 06:23:56 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
I'm really sorry, this totally slipped through the cracks yesterday (and just seeing it now since I'm digging out from under 
the avalanche of emails) â€”  you probably have it by now, but just in case not, the three attorneys who have appeared for 
him are: 
Martin Weinberg 
Reid Weingarten 
Marc Fernich 
From: 
Sent: Monday, July 08, 2019 13:13 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Epstein's attorney? 
Do you have his attorney info? 
Public Affairs 
U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York 
Website: WVAKitistice.goviusao-sdny 
Facebook: hups://wwwfacebook.com/usaosdny
Follow us on Twitter: gSDNYnews 
EFTA00030184
